name: Why Crossy Chicken Crossed the Road?
name_original: Why Crossy Chicken Crossed the Road?
description:
Why did Chicken cross the road? To get to the other side of course!!

See how many roads YOU can get Chicken to cross in this super simple, yet maddeningly addictive, endless arcade runner game. You won't be able to put it down, trust us.

HOW TO PLAY

* Simply tap the screen repeatedly to make Chicken run. The faster you tap, the faster you run!

* Watch out for cars and trucks! If you get hit, it's GAME OVER.

* Each road that Chicken crosses = 1 point. See if you can get a High Score!

* Keep an eye on your Power Meter - if you tap too slowly you run out of power and it's GAME OVER for you!

That's it!

GET STARTED NOW AND DOWNLOAD IT FOR FREE!!!!!!
